  • Performance
  • Back tests
  • Faq
  • Contact
Buy now!

AUTOMATED SCALPING

Best scalper EA

Scalper EA is the perfect expert advisor to scalp the markets automated. Rule out your emotion and trade like a pro instantly.
BUY NOW!

Scalper EA description

Scalper EA is created to scalp the markets without spending time in front of your screen. It enters trades fully automated in all currency pairs. The expert advisor is perfect for novice as well as experienced forex traders who wish to not spend much time in front of a screen. 

Trade without emotion

An expert advisor allows you to create a passive income when managed correctly. No need to spend a lot of screen time and let the robot do the trading for you! No emotion, no lot size errors etc, but a solid trading algorithm scanning the markets for good trades.

Why scalping is so profitable

Scalping EA’s try to achieve little market exposure. Regardless of the trend, it takes small profits. Therefore it prevents you from paying swaps and being stuck in a trade for too long. 

Built to make you a consistent trader

  • Set files
  • Tutorial
  • Full support

The scalper EA runs best in a 1:400 leveraged account where you can opt for a single trade or a grid mode. Ideal for traders that prefer automation aiming for a high win ratio. It trades on M1, M5, M15 for daytraders. For longer trades you can use M30, H1 or H4 time frame. We provide you with the most updated set files. 

Features

  • M5-M15-M30-H1time frame
  • All currency pairs
  • MT4
  • Fully or semi automated
  • Any leverage
  • Risk settings
  • TP/SL/Lot size
  • Go long/ go short
  • Scalp mode
  • Volatility filter
  • Account size from $100
  • Easy installation
  • Including set files

Backtests

Although a backtest does not prove much, we still like to show it. Especially to display the 99.9% tick data. This expert advisor is developed for novice and experienced traders. The EA uses a sophisticated algorithm that only triggers entries when markets are retracing. This to prevent to be exposed to sudden spikes.

Small accounts same profits

Also for smaller account sizes from $250 for example, this scalper EA can be very suitable. Click on the chart to download the full back test. 

click on the image

click on the image

Dynamic scalping ea settings

For those that like to see a machine gun trading, you can have a look at this back test. 2000+ trades per year in just one pair!

GBPNZD – 2021 

click on the image

How to get started

1. Open MT4 account

The scalper Ea is supported by the MT4 trading platform. Any broker that offers this platform will do. 

2. Install the EA

Once you purchased a license  you will receive an email where we will ask for your MT4 account number. After receiving the EA you can install it on your MT4 trading platform. 

3. Start trading

Once your scalper EA is installed on your MT4 terminal, you are all set. Our support team is here to help.

Faq

Most frequent questions and answers
Who is Scalprobot?

We are team of three prop traders (stocks, futures, forex) and mainly trade for our own accounts as well as the accounts of asset managers and hedgefunds. Since many retail traders lose money due to lack of knowledge and time, we decided to create trading software that would shorten the learning curve and make trading easier.  We don’t claim to have the holy grail, but do know that our support is appreciated by many traders. Ruling out 70% of risks gives you an edge that can help to make you a profitable trader. 

Can I purchase a license for MT4?

Our policy is to first test the robot via our copy feature. In this way you know exactly what you purchase and are you able to see forward testing, instead of back testing. 

How much does it cost?

After you copied the robot you can decide to purchase a life time license or continue to copy with real money. We will send you the Stripe link to make a payment. A license costs €179 ex VAT in your country. 

How long before I receive my EA after I purchased?

Usually the same day during week days. If you purchased in the weekend, the EA will be send on Monday. You can always contact us via Whatsapp about a status update. 

How do I know for sure this scalping robot actually works?

We offer free trials for some EA’s and also we put live trading results on our website. There is never a guarantee that you will gain from any EA. However, we made it our mission to teach as many traders as possible how to become consistent and profitable. 

What is the minimum account size?

Depending on your leverage and lot size, but you can start as low as $100. If you like to trade US indices, it’s recommended to trade with at least $400 in your account. 

How do I install the EA?

After your purchase, you are directed to our tutorial page where you will see detailed videos of how to install the EA. Still having problems? No worries, reach out to our support, we are glad to help. 

Can I use it with any MT4 broker?

Yes, however there can be a large difference between brokers in terms of fees. Many traders only look at spreads, but executions and swap rates are as important. Just be careful when choosing a broker, especially the off shore ones. We are not saying they are all bad, but clearly there is a lack of regulation. Contact us if you have questions about your broker, our team knows many!

Do I need a VPS?

No, although it is highly recommended to leave your computer online. 

Is there a money back guarantee?

No. Make sure you understand the strategy before making a purchase. You can always ask us anything about this EA. 

Do you offer discounts or promotions?
Yes. In combination with our partner broker account we offer all our services for free.
Can I become an affiliate?

Yes. Contact us via info@scalprobot.com for more information.

I am a broker, do you offer partnerships?

Yes. Contact us via info@scalprobot.com for more information.

Scam Alert

Scalprobot seems to draw a lot of attention, probably because the live results are great.  

It has been brought to our attention that some scammers decompiled our EA, which is illegal. 

Obviously we knew this could happen when we started this project. Therefore we created a hurdle within the strategy that can only be taken once the EA has been bought on this website. In other words, after your purchase you wll receive the missing key to use this EA, without it, it’s useless. 

Furthermore a decompiled EA is in most cases not updated and can have bugs that affects your trades. Besides, you will not get any support since its “creators” have no clue what the strategy does.  

These scam websites have no good intentions other than making you believe you can save some money and earn a quick buck by stealing other peoples visions and ideas. Just google them and you will find out. Clearly these people have no knowledge about trading whatsoever. 

It’s those scammers that give this great asset class a bad name and hopefully you appreciate our hard work and support.

In case you have not enough money to purchase this EA, just opt for our a free EA in combination with a broker account. Contact us for more information. 

Feel the excitement of artificial intelligent trading bots

Risk warning

Trading foreign exchange on margin carries a high level of risk, and may not be suitable for all investors. The high degree of leverage can work against you as well as for you. Before deciding to invest in foreign exchange you should carefully consider your investment objectives, level of experience, and risk appetite. The possibility exists that you could sustain a loss of some or all of your initial investment and therefore you should not invest money that you cannot afford to lose. You should be aware of all the risks associated with foreign exchange trading, and seek advice from an independent financial advisor if you have any doubts.

© 2023 Scalprobot™ All Rights Reserved.
